name: Goblin Puncher eXtreme: Blood Feud (GPX)
description:
Goblin Puncher eXtreme: Blood Feud is a text based JavaScript RPG. It's a game where you can write a novel, encounter a monster reading your novel, pry it from their cold dead fingers, and beat things to death with it.

The game randomly generates monsters, weapons, and quests, and tracks your family's history through generations of ridiculous conflict.

It is still in active development, and is currently in its version 1.3 release.
